title: Saute some onions in butter until wilted and then add two broths cubes (if you have them) but only one cup water. If you have canned stock (no cubes) you'd need to add twice the volume of stock and reduce by half (added to the onions after they saute)
directions: Saute some onions in butter until wilted and then add two broths cubes (if you have them) but only one cup water.
If you have canned stock (no cubes) you'd need to add twice the volume of stock and reduce by half (added to the onions after they saute)
